hero-lead: a front-end developer and UI designer based in São Paulo, Brazil
section-services-subtitle: What I do and I like to do!
section-about-me-text:
Born in Minas Gerais and raised in São Paulo, I have always been passionate about technology and trying to create something new.
Graduated in Informatics at ETEC de Embu and in Computer Science, I continue my studies, focused on front-end development and moving towards UI Design, where I believe that these are two areas that go hand in hand.
